titleStmt.title: A real demonstration of the true order in the spirit of God and of the ground of all formality & idolatry, with a few words unto such as are concerned in it.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Title article by William Smith, others by Elisabeth Newton, John and Hannah Reckless, Martha Plats, Prudence Harding, Sarah Watsone and John Moon.
Reproduction of original in the Bevan-Naish Collection.
